description: A Markdown, ReStructured Text, HTML, Jade, Pug, Image, CSS, Mermaid previewer.
config.markdown.abbr.enabled: Enable/disable rendering Abbreviation (<abbr>) tag in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.math.macros: A collection of custom macros. Each macro is a key-value pair where the key is a new command name and the value is the expansion of the macro.
config.markdown.anchor.enabled: Enable/disable rendering id attribute to headings in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.attrs.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.cjk-breaks.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.deflist.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.emoji.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.

config.markdown.highlightjs.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.html.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.ins.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.lazy-headers.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.mark.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
config.markdown.markdown.enabled: Enable/disable rendering GitHub-style task lists in the built-in Markdown preview.
